name: Ninja Stealth
description: Evade the guards and the defences to escape the evil facility on this click and play stealth game, there will be difficult on your path, young padawan!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Oh well, this is awkward. I tried to enjoy this game and be able to go through.....but, it's really not working, I don't judge a book by it's cover, but the graphics don't take you to a good start, the controls are buggy, the hit detection is very faulty, till then I'm going to have to give a negative review, this game needs an urgent fix.
